alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Burnett; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 6:22PM CDT until May 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WASHBURN...SOUTHWESTERN ASHLAND...NORTHERN PRICE... SOUTHEASTERN BURNETT AND SAWYER COUNTIES... At 621 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Butternut, to 6 miles southeast of Radisson, to near Haugen, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Butternut, Park Falls, Fifield and Phillips. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
